languages.text: Судя по аккуратным мелким зарубкам, владелец этого шлема вел счет убитой нечисти. Судя по их количеству — его служба была праведной.
The small, methodical notches on the helmet suggest that its owner kept track of slain abominations. The number of the notches suggests that their service was righteous.
languages.original_text: Судя по аккуратным мелким зарубкам, владелец этого шлема вел счет убитой нечисти. Судя по их количеству — его служба была праведной.

The small, methodical notches on the helmet suggest that its owner kept track of slain abominations. The number of the notches suggests that their service was righteous.

languages.text: Les petites encoches qui couvrent le casque à intervalles réguliers suggèrent que son porteur gardait le compte des abominations éliminées. Vu leur nombre, il s'est acquitté de sa mission avec diligence.
languages.original_text: The small, methodical notches on the helmet suggest that its owner kept track of slain abominations. The number of the notches suggests that their service was righteous.

traits.locale_text: Les petites encoches qui couvrent le casque à intervalles réguliers suggèrent que son porteur gardait le compte des abominations éliminées. Vu leur nombre, il s'est acquitté de sa mission avec diligence.

languages.text: ヘルメットに刻まれた小さく几帳面な刻み目は、その所有者が討ち取った忌まわしき者の数を示している。刻み目の数から、その務めが正義に基づいていたことがうかがえた。
languages.original_text: The small, methodical notches on the helmet suggest that its owner kept track of slain abominations. The number of the notches suggests that their service was righteous.

traits.locale_text: ヘルメットに刻まれた小さく几帳面な刻み目は、その所有者が討ち取った忌まわしき者の数を示している。刻み目の数から、その務めが正義に基づいていたことがうかがえた。

languages.text: Miğferdeki küçük, metodik çentikler; sahibinin, katlettiği iğrenç yaratıkların kaydını tuttuğunu gösteriyor. Çentik sayısı, hizmetinin ne kadar yüce olduğunu kanıtlıyor.
languages.original_text: The small, methodical notches on the helmet suggest that its owner kept track of slain abominations. The number of the notches suggests that their service was righteous.

traits.locale_text: Miğferdeki küçük, metodik çentikler; sahibinin, katlettiği iğrenç yaratıkların kaydını tuttuğunu gösteriyor. Çentik sayısı, hizmetinin ne kadar yüce olduğunu kanıtlıyor.

languages.text: Las pequeñas muescas metódicas del casco indican que su propietario llevaba la cuenta de las abominaciones abatidas. El número de muescas demuestra un servicio grandioso.
languages.original_text: The small, methodical notches on the helmet suggest that its owner kept track of slain abominations. The number of the notches suggests that their service was righteous.

traits.locale_text: Las pequeñas muescas metódicas del casco indican que su propietario llevaba la cuenta de las abominaciones abatidas. El número de muescas demuestra un servicio grandioso.

languages.text: 头盔上刻着许多小小的刻痕，代表着这顶头盔前任主人杀死的邪恶之物，而刻痕的数量表明了前任主人侍奉正义的决心。
languages.original_text: The small, methodical notches on the helmet suggest that its owner kept track of slain abominations. The number of the notches suggests that their service was righteous.

traits.locale_text: 头盔上刻着许多小小的刻痕，代表着这顶头盔前任主人杀死的邪恶之物，而刻痕的数量表明了前任主人侍奉正义的决心。

languages.text: Die kleinen, methodischen Kerben auf dem Helm deuten darauf hin, dass sein Besitzer über von ihm erschlagene Abscheulichkeiten Buch geführt hat. Die Zahl der Kerben lässt vermuten, dass er ruhmreich gedient hat.
languages.original_text: The small, methodical notches on the helmet suggest that its owner kept track of slain abominations. The number of the notches suggests that their service was righteous.

traits.locale_text: Die kleinen, methodischen Kerben auf dem Helm deuten darauf hin, dass sein Besitzer über von ihm erschlagene Abscheulichkeiten Buch geführt hat. Die Zahl der Kerben lässt vermuten, dass er ruhmreich gedient hat.
